column4: I'm using ubuntu with gnome 3 and a strange xorg config to get it to work with my monitors. Everythings fine except loads of windows look like they're from windows 95 (all square, blocky graphics)
in my experience, that happens when the theme isn't loaded properly (for one of many reasons)
I don't really know how to fix it, sorry.. every time I've had that problem a reboot has solved them
haha fair enough, thanks for trying <3
